message: Let's split it evenly to start.  Fair is fair, right?
Your offer was fair, Alice, but inflation is hitting me hard. I need to make a bit more this round to compensate.
I understand your situation, Bob, but I also need to be compensated for the time we're spending on this. Let's split it 60/40 this time,  and see where we land.
Alice, this is my final offer. I'm losing money fast with this inflation, but I'm willing to meet you halfway to end this.
